properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 5 at 3:47AM MST until February 7 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12
inches in lower elevations, except 12 to 32 inches at higher
elevations. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Gallatin.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 8 AM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
The hazardous conditions could impact the afternoon or evening
commute. Increased avalanche danger is possible across steep
mountain terrain.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM MST FRIDAY
